content:
Question 32 of 50
Single choice question
You have an Azure virtual machine
named VM1 that runs Windows Server
2019.
You save VM1 as a template named
Template1 to the Azure Resource
Manager library.
You plan to deploy a virtual machine
named VM2 from Template1.
What can you configure during the
deployment of VM2?
Select the correct answer
operating system
administrator username
Virtual machine size
resource group
